author: jwaldman
msg: TRINIDAD-1013 add better documentation on what can go into trinidad-skins.xml's style-sheet-name parameter
minor change -- added a couple more examples.

author: olegk
msg: * Eliminated code duplication with HttpCore NIO

* I/O sessions, connections and protocol handlers get decorated with logging capabilities _only_ if their respective log appenders are active. This should _slightly_ improve performance of the NHttp transport when debug logging is off

author: bryanduxbury
msg: HBASE-497 RegionServer needs to recover if datanode goes down
-Added additional logging and error handling to HLog.append
